verses.verse: Then the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came <WH1961> to me saying, <WH559>

"Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> prophesy <WH5012> against <WH5921> the shepherds <WH7462> of Israel. <WH3478> Prophesy <WH5012> and say <WH559> to those shepherds, <WH7462> 'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Woe, <WH1945> shepherds <WH7462> of Israel <WH3478> who <WH834> have been <WH1961> feeding <WH7462> themselves! Should not the shepherds <WH7462> feed <WH7462> the flock <WH6629>?
"You eat <WH398> the fat <WH2459> and clothe <WH3847> yourselves <WH3847> with the wool, <WH6785> you slaughter <WH2076> the fat <WH1277> [sheep] without <WH3808> feeding <WH7462> the flock. <WH6629>

"Those who are sickly <WH2470> you have not strengthened, <WH2388> the diseased <WH2470> you have not healed, <WH7495> the broken <WH7665> you have not bound <WH2280> up, the scattered <WH5080> you have not brought <WH7725> back, <WH7725> nor <WH3808> have you sought <WH1245> for the lost; but with force <WH6> and with severity <WH2394> you have dominated <WH6531> them.
"And they were scattered <WH6327> for lack <WH1097> of a shepherd, <WH7462> and they became <WH1961> food <WH402> for every <WH3605> beast <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> and were scattered. <WH6327>

"My flock <WH6629> wandered <WH7686> through all <WH3605> the mountains <WH2022> and on every <WH3605> high <WH7311> hill, <WH1389> and My flock <WH6629> was scattered <WH6327> over <WH5921> all <WH3605> the surface <WH6440> of the earth; <WH776> and there <WH369> was no <WH369> one <WH369> to search <WH1875> or seek <WH1245> [for them.]"' "
Therefore, <WH3651> you shepherds, <WH7462> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord: <WH3068>

"As I live, <WH2416>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "surely <WH518> <WH3808> because <WH3282> My flock <WH6629> has become <WH1961> a prey, <WH957> My flock <WH6629> has even become <WH1961> food <WH402> for all <WH3605> the beasts <WH9130> of the field <WH7704> for lack <WH369> of a shepherd, <WH7462> and My shepherds <WH7462> did not search <WH1875> for My flock, <WH6629> but [rather] the shepherds <WH7462> fed <WH7462> themselves and did not feed <WH7462> My flock; <WH6629>
therefore, <WH3651> you shepherds, <WH7462> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the Lord: <WH3068>

'Thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH2009> I am against <WH413> the shepherds, <WH7462> and I shall demand <WH1875> My sheep <WH6629> from them and make them cease <WH7673> from feeding <WH7462> sheep. <WH6629> So the shepherds <WH7462> will not feed <WH7462> themselves anymore, <WH5750> but I shall deliver <WH5337> My flock <WH6629> from their mouth, <WH6310> that they may not be food <WH402> for them."' "
For thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> "Behold, <WH2009> I Myself <WH589> will search <WH1875> for My sheep <WH6629> and seek <WH1239> them out.

"As a shepherd <WH7462> cares <WH1243> for his herd <WH5739> in the day <WH3117> when he is among <WH8432> his scattered <WH6567> sheep, <WH6629> so <WH3651> I will care <WH1239> for My sheep <WH6629> and will deliver <WH5337> them from all <WH3605> the places <WH4725> to which <WH834> they were scattered <WH6327> on a cloudy <WH6051> and gloomy <WH6205> day. <WH3117>

"And I will bring <WH3318> them out from the peoples <WH5971> and gather <WH6908> them from the countries <WH776> and bring <WH935> them to their own land; <WH127> and I will feed <WH7462> them on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel, <WH3478> by the streams, <WH650> and in all <WH3605> the inhabited <WH4186> places <WH4186> of the land. <WH776>

"I will feed <WH7462> them in a good <WH2896> pasture, <WH4829> and their grazing <WH5116> ground <WH5116> will be on the mountain <WH2022> heights <WH4791> of Israel. <WH3478> There <WH8033> they will lie <WH7257> down <WH7257> in good <WH2896> grazing <WH5116> ground, <WH5116> and they will feed <WH7462> in rich <WH8082> pasture <WH4829> on the mountains <WH2022> of Israel. <WH3478>
"I will feed <WH7462> My flock <WH6629> and I will lead <WH7257> them to rest, <WH7257>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>

"I will seek <WH1245> the lost, bring <WH6> back <WH7725> the scattered, <WH7725> bind <WH5080> up the broken, <WH2280> and strengthen <WH7665> the sick; <WH2388> but the fat <WH2470> and the strong <WH8082> I will destroy. <WH2389> I will feed <WH8045> them with judgment. <WH7462>

"And as for you, My flock, <WH6629> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH3068> 'Behold, <WH2009> I will judge <WH8199> between <WH996> one sheep <WH7716> and another, <WH7716> between the rams <WH352> and the male <WH6260> goats. <WH6260>

'Is it too <WH4480> slight <WH4592> a thing <WH4592> for you that you should feed <WH7462> in the good <WH2896> pasture, <WH4829> that you must tread <WH7429> down <WH7429> with your feet <WH7272> the rest <WH3499> of your pastures <WH4829>? Or that you should drink <WH8354> of the clear <WH4950> waters, <WH4325> that you must foul <WH7511> the rest <WH3498> with your feet <WH7272>?

'And as for My flock, <WH6629> they must eat <WH7462> what <WH4823> you tread <WH4823> down <WH4823> with your feet, <WH7272> and they must drink <WH8354> what <WH4833> you foul <WH4833> with your feet! <WH7272>' "

Therefore, <WH3651> thus <WH3541> says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> God <WH3068> to them, "Behold, <WH2009> I, even I, will judge <WH8199> between <WH996> the fat <WH1277> sheep <WH7716> and the lean <WH7330> sheep. <WH7716>

"Because <WH3282> you push <WH1920> with side <WH6654> and with shoulder, <WH3802> and thrust <WH1920> at all <WH3605> the weak <WH2470> with your horns, <WH7161> until <WH5704> <WH834> you have scattered <WH6327> them abroad, <WH2351>
therefore, I will deliver <WH3467> My flock, <WH6629> and they will no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> be a prey; <WH957> and I will judge <WH8199> between <WH996> one sheep <WH7716> and another. <WH7716>

"Then I will set <WH6965> over <WH5921> them one <WH259> shepherd, <WH7462> My servant <WH5650> David, <WH1732> and he will feed <WH7462> them; he will feed <WH7462> them himself <WH1931> and be their shepherd. <WH7462>
"And I, the Lord, <WH3068> will be their God, <WH430> and My servant <WH5650> David <WH1732> will be prince <WH5387> among <WH8432> them; I, the Lord, <WH3068> have spoken. <WH1696>

"And I will make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> of peace <WH7965> with them and eliminate <WH7673> harmful <WH7451> beasts <WH9130> from the land, <WH776> so that they may live <WH3427> securely <WH983> in the wilderness <WH4057> and sleep <WH3462> in the woods. <WH3293>

"And I will make <WH5414> them and the places <WH5439> around <WH5439> My hill <WH1389> a blessing. <WH1293> And I will cause showers <WH1653> to come <WH3381> down <WH3381> in their season; <WH6256> they will be showers <WH1653> of blessing. <WH1293>

"Also the tree <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> will yield <WH5414> its fruit, <WH6529> and the earth <WH776> will yield <WH5414> its increase, <WH2981> and they will be secure <WH983> on their land. <WH127> Then they will know <WH3045> that I am the Lord, <WH3068> when I have broken <WH7665> the bars <WH4133> of their yoke <WH5923> and have delivered <WH5337> them from the hand <WH3027> of those who enslaved <WH5647> them.

"And they will no <WH3808> longer <WH5750> be a prey <WH957> to the nations, <WH1471> and the beasts <WH9130> of the earth <WH776> will not devour <WH398> them; but they will live <WH3427> securely, <WH983> and no <WH369> one <WH369> will make <WH2729> [them] afraid. <WH2729>

"And I will establish <WH6965> for them a renowned <WH8034> planting <WH4302> place, <WH4302> and they will not again <WH5750> be victims <WH622> of famine <WH7458> in the land, <WH776> and they will not endure <WH5375> the insults <WH3639> of the nations <WH1471> anymore. <WH5750>

"Then they will know <WH3045> that I, the Lord <WH3068> their God, <WH430> am with them, and that they, the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> are My people, <WH5971>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>
"As for you, My sheep, <WH6629> the sheep <WH6629> of My pasture, <WH4830> you are men, <WH120> and I am your God, <WH430>" declares <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> God. <WH3068>
